about.text: I am an open-minded and creative person, and enjoy learning about the world of technology, the interest for which had stemmed from curiosity of the new world. In my free time, I enjoy reading books on self-improvement and understanding how entrepreneurs think. Being organized and observant are skills of mine, combined with the ability to adapt to my environment.

skills.description: My first language, HTML introduced me to the world of web development and gave me an idea of how far my skills could go. It provided me with a solid foundation in understanding how websites are structured and designed. This initial exposure further sparked my curiosity and motivated me to learn more complex languages.

Delving deeper into the world of programming, I was allowed to show my creative side with this language, giving life to my projects and making them visually appealing.I learned the art of layout design, color theory, and responsive design principles, allowing me to create user-friendly and visually engaging experiences. I was able to build dynamic and adaptable web pages.

JavaScript had opened up new possibilities for adding interactivity and functionality to my web projects. I have mastered the fundamentals of manipulating the DOM, handling events, and validating user input. JavaScript's versatility and power greatly expanded my skill set, giving me the tools to create robust, dynamic web experiences that could adapt to users' needs and deliver seamless performance across different devices and platforms.

React.js was a game-changer in my development journey as my first framework. Creating interfaces not only became easier thanks to its component-based architecture, but allowed me to build more modular, efficient, and maintainable code. React's virtual DOM and declarative approach made it easier to develop interactive UIs that responded quickly to user interactions.

As a beginner, this framework has been a transformative experience. Its simple and intuitive design, concepts including data binding and components, allowed me to grasp the essentials of modern JavaScript frameworks. The reactivity system in Vue, along with its powerful state management through Vuex, enabled me to handle complex data interactions smoothly and efficiently.

testimonials.name: Nicki Abels
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.testimonial: Robyn is an extremely dedicated creative and dedicated worker. Her attention to detail is phenomenal. She remains willing to learn new skills and gain more knowledge. Robyn is very approachable and always goes the extra mile in all she does.

testimonials.name: Imaraan Sheldon
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.testimonial: Working alongside Robyn Carnow has been an absolute pleasure. Her intelligence, diligence, and unwavering always ready to step up and contribute whenever needed. Her ability to tackle challenges with precision speaks volumes about her character and work ethic. What sets Robyn apart is not only her remarkable competence but also her integrity. She is someone you can rely on without hesitation, knowing that the task will be efficiently and with the utmost dedication. In all aspects, Robyn embodies trustworthiness and reliability, making her an invaluable asset to any team fortunate enough to have her.

testimonials.name: Anushqa Kandan
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.testimonial: Robyn embodies a great mix of creativity intellegence and critical thinking. She is extremely committed to any task given and tends to go the extra mile when necessary. Robyn's coding skills transcends boundaries and constantly leave those around her amazed. She's an amazing team  player and works well under pressure. Aside from this, what makes her a great candidate is her humbled nature and willingness to help others.

testimonials.name: Jadee Paulse
testimonials.title: Peer
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Robyn has been an absolute delight. Her passion for coding always shines through in every project she takes on. Robyn's dedication and drive to solve any problem that comes her way never cease to amaze me.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.title: Lecturer
testimonials.testimonial: Robyn is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments. She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce her as an exceptional candidate and developer.

projects.description: A basic keyboard layout with a retro color palette built with Flexbox.
A functioning calculator that calculates with the use of all operators.
A visual imitation of the original Hulu website.
A podcast application built with React + Vite, displaying shows from an API and making use of a sample audio.
This website displays a range of books through which users may search a title or author. Books can be clicked to view more information.

One of my biggest JavaScript projects, this e-commerce website includes search function of a product, adding and removing it from a shopping cart, and removing the product's existence as an administrator.
Built with React + Vite, this website has a basic design with replaceable text.
